title: What's the best way to communicate sarcasm through text? - Quora

Sarcasm is best dished through a straight face and tone in verbal communication. I think this is because most times, after a sarcastic retort, the target will usually look at you with an “are you serious look?”. And the best thing to do is keep a straight face then! While achieving the tone might not be that easy on text, it's easier to pull a straight face. The best way (on text), is use of this emoji right here “” That bad boy, the look on his face, says it all. So just think up your sarcastic stuff (of course) then use that for effect.
